mapper.select: select case when (start_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime}) or (end_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime}) or (start_time <= #{startTime} and end_time >= #{endTime}) or (start_time >= #{startTime} and end_time <= #{end_time}) then 'yes' else 'no' end as OverLapping from sandbox.guest.play_bookings where game_id = #{gameId} and booking_date = #{date}
select name, start_time, end_time from sandbox.guest.play_bookings as b join sandbox.guest.play_users as u on b.user_id = u.user_id where game_id = #{gameId}

select user_id, start_time, end_time, player_id from sandbox.guest.play_bookings b JOIN sandbox.guest.play_booking_players p ON b.booking_id = p.booking_id where b.game_id = 1 and booking_date = #{date} and ((start_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime}) or (end_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime}) or (start_time <= #{startTime} and end_time >= #{endTime}) or (start_time >= #{startTime} and end_time <= #{end_time})
